summary: Berlin, 1923. Following the suicide of his brother, American circus acrobat Abel Rosenberg attempts to survive while facing unemployment, depression, alcoholism and the social decay of Germany during the Weimar Republic.
cast: Liv Ullmann|David Carradine|Gert Fröbe|Heinz Bennent|Toni Berger|Christian Berkel|Paula Braend|Erna Brünell|Paul Bürks|Gaby Dohm|Emil Feist|Kai Fischer|Georg Hartmann|Edith Heerdegen|Klaus Hoffmann|Grischa Huber|Volkert Kraeft|Gunther Malzacher|Lisi Mangold|Günter Meisner|Kyra Mladeck|Adelheid Picha|Hans Quest|Charles Regnier|Walter Schmidinger|Irene Steinbeisser|Fritz Straßner|Glynn Turman|Ellen Umlauf|Wolfgang Weiser|James Whitmore|Ralf Wolter|Isolde Barth|Richard Bohne|Paul Burian|Hildegard Busse|Hans Eichler|Herbert Fux|Renate Grosser|Heino Hallhuber|Rosemarie Heinikel|Harry Kalenberg|Andrea L'Arronge|Beverly McNeely|Anne Mertin|Hubert Mittendorf|Juergen J. Straub|Hertha von Walther
keywords: watching through a mirror|antisemitism|depression|reference to lenin|reference to the russian revolution
title: El huevo de la serpiente
